description:
Aidan recently came out to everyone he knows and he’s been having a great time exploring his sexuality.

“You are all smiles today, huh?” I asked. He had a grin from ear to ear, so it was obvious he was excited to be here.

“I’ve been a fan for a long time,” he said. “I guess you could say I ‘grew up’ with Sean Cody!”

“What do you mean?”

“Well,” he explained. “I had girlfriends, but it was never... you know. I would fool around with them, but I would think about getting fucked by someone like Harley.”

“Yeah,” I laughed. “That would definitely be a sign that you’re gay!”

Aside from getting to see our place firsthand, Aidan admitted that he always wanted to do this to get over his stage fright.

“I took a public speaking course in college,” he said. “And, well, I sort of passed out in the middle of a speech.”

“Do you think you’ll pass out here?”

“No!” he laughed. “That would be so awkward!”

Sure enough, it wasn’t a problem. Aidan quickly came out of his shell and had a great time showing off every inch of his nicely toned body.

It had been a few days since he'd cum, so he was ready to explode... and he did!

“Wow! Do you always shoot that much?”

Aidan blushed. “Yep,” he said...
title: Aidan
